name: Dark Grey Tumblr
description:
The new tumblr blue sucks. I didn't want a solid black dashboard because I found it too dark, but I felt like a change from the old blue would be nice as well. So here's a dark grey version! Should be x-kit compatible. 

Lemme know if there's anything I missed out in the comments or whatever and I'll put that back in.
additional_info:
13/02/19 -- First uploaded
14/02/19 -- Fixed a bit I missed out underneath icons
19/02/19 -- Well something happened with Tumblr... anyway, it's fixed now
19/02/19 -- Whoops, it wasn't working on some screen resolutions... NOW it should be fixed.
